scripts.test:coverage: forge clean && forge build && FOUNDRY_PROFILE='full_test' EORACLE_CHAIN_ID=42420 forge coverage
scripts.test:coverage:debug: forge clean && forge build && FOUNDRY_PROFILE='full_test' EORACLE_CHAIN_ID=42420 forge coverage --report debug
scripts.test:coverage:report: forge clean && forge build && FOUNDRY_PROFILE='full_test' EORACLE_CHAIN_ID=42420 forge coverage --report lcov && lcov --rc lcov_branch_coverage=1 --remove lcov.info  -o lcov.info 'test/*'  'script/*' 'src/examples/*' 'src/libraries/*' && genhtml lcov.info --branch-coverage --output-dir coverage
scripts.pre-commit: if ! git diff --cached --quiet --exit-code -- '*.sol'; then npm run gas-snapshot && git add .gas-snapshot; fi && npx lint-staged
scripts.pre-push: git diff HEAD --ignore-submodules --quiet && FOUNDRY_PROFILE='full_test' EORACLE_CHAIN_ID=42420 forge test  --force --watch-delay 500ms
